en.trl_intro_00: Welcome to the simulation game, Battle Bot!
en.trl_intro_01: Your job is to beat the boss of the simulation.
en.trl_intro_02: But first, I'd recommend you do some smaller battles to level-up and get new moves.
en.trl_intro_03: To the left is your health, which causes a game over if it hits 0.
en.trl_intro_04: To the right is your energy, which is needed to perform moves.
en.trl_intro_05: That will be explained more when you get into battle.
en.trl_intro_06: Speaking of which, click or touch an unlocked door to enter it.
en.trl_intro_07: The rest of the rooms will be unlocked once you clear a battle.
en.trl_battle_00: Welcome to the battle phase of the game!
en.trl_battle_01: Your job is to make your opponent's health hit 0.
en.trl_battle_02: If your health hits 0 then you will get a game over.
en.trl_battle_03: To attack your opponent, select one of your moves.
en.trl_battle_04: You can hold up to 4 moves at a time, and might be able to get a new move when you level-up.
en.trl_battle_05: If you don't have enough energy to perform a move it will be unavailable.
en.trl_battle_06: You'll need to hit the charge option to gain energy, which takes a turn.
en.trl_battle_07: You can also try your hand at running away if you wish to retreat, but it may fail.
en.trl_treasure_01: You get a free level-up, health restore, and energy restore if you collect the treasure.
en.trl_treasure_02: If you leave the treasure you can come back and open it later.
en.trl_overworld_00: Now that you've attempted a room, the final boss room is now open.
en.trl_overworld_01: The game ends when you beat the boss, so clear as many rooms as you think you need.
en.trl_overworld_02: The more rooms you clear the stronger you'll become.
en.trl_overworld_03: Enemies will get stronger the longer the game goes on, so keep that in mind.
en.trl_boss01: All you need is to beat the boss to win the game!
en.trl_gameOver_01: All living enemies have had their health and energy restored.
en.trl_gameOver_02: Your health and energy have also been restored, but your moves have been randomized.
